articles.description:
RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.lens
We'll be hosting a new Lens community event in Mexico City 🇲🇽 on December 8 🌿
We'll be presenting an introduction to Lens, a developer workshop, & all attendees will be able to claim a Lens handle. There will also be food!
Sign ups are now open here: https://lu.ma/lens-cdmx-2022

articles.description:
Joins us and @hedera folk on Spaces tomorrow!
We'll be chatting about all the awesome work by #WomenInCrypto to help us achieve a decentralised future 🫡
Don't forget to hit the reminder 👇
Hedera: ⚡️This Monday 9AM PST, join #Hedera & @developer_dao on Spaces for an open panel discussion to learn more about some of the incredible work being done by #WomenInCrypto to move us further towards the decentralized #web3 future!
Set your reminders below👇
 https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1PlJQpqLYBzGE

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
WeaveDB - Decentralized NoSQL DB on @ArweaveTeam  ⚡️
WeaveDB is a decentralized Firestore, which brings smooth UX, complexity, and scalability to web3 dapps. Developers can build complex logic for full-stack dapps without writing a smart contract. https://weavedb.mirror.xyz/E4VmonwIP2hV3W3wIum3oFz4giAPzM2E_DeSRLQelL0

articles.description:
RT Josh 👻🌿 | svg.eth
Viewing contracts on etherscan is a pain in the arse, so I created a CLI tool to automatically pull any verified contract in your IDE, create you a development environment allowing you to modify, compile and deploy it all within the IDE you love. Enjoy! https://github.com/joshstevens19/evmc

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT the luke 🏳️‍🌈
There's no limit to the size you can upload to @ArweaveTeam with  @BundlrNetwork. We offer optional event callbacks you can use to get updated each time a new file "chunk" is uploaded, here I use the callback data to build a progress bar. Seconds later 90MB are on the permaweb.
